mapper.insert: insert into tb_stusub (stusubid, stuid, subid, pickorder, pickflag, operator, operatedtime) values (#{stusubid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pickorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pickflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_stusub set stuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subid = #{subid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pickorder = #{pickorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pickflag = #{pickflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatedtime = #{operatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where stusubid = #{stusubid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select stusubid, stuid, subid, pickorder, pickflag, operator, operatedtime from tb_stusub
